name: ACF REST API Extended
author: TanaponBB

sections.description:
Extends WordPress REST API with ACF Options and GTM Tracking endpoints.

Features

  • ACF Options API - GET and POST endpoints for all ACF option fields
  • GTM Tracking - Dedicated endpoints and admin page for Google Tag Manager
  • WooCommerce Settings - Coupon and Tax enable/disable via REST API
  • Auto-Updates - Automatic updates from Google Cloud Storage
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/acf-rest-api
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen
  3. Ensure ACF is installed and activated
  4. Configure GTM tracking in the 'GTM Tracking' admin menu
sections.changelog:
1.1.4 - Initial Release

  • Options REST API endpoints
  • Remove Unuse file
  • WooCommerce Coupon settings endpoint
  • WooCommerce Tax settings endpoint
  • Auto-update support via GCS
sections.faq:
Does this require ACF Pro?

No, works with both ACF Free and Pro.

How do I secure the API endpoints?

Read operations are public by default. Write operations require authentication. Modify permission callbacks in class-rest-endpoints.php as needed.

upgrade_notice: Version 1.1.4 - Disable Tax setting API Route.
